product_name: Planet Bike Blaze 2-Watt Micro Front Bike Light and Superflash Turbo Rear Bike Light Combination Set
long_description: Enhancing rear visibility with an improved flashing mode and lighting the path ahead, this set includes the Planet Bike Blaze 2-Watt Micro front bike light and a Superflash Turbo rear bike light.
short_description: Enhancing rear visibility with an improved flashing mode and lighting the path ahead, this set includes the Planet Bike Blaze 2-Watt Micro front bike light and a Superflash Turbo rear bike light.
